title: First Photos From The Wedding Of Dora Akunyili’s Daughter To Her Canadian Husband In Anambra
content: Facebook    Twitter    Google+    Pinterest    WhatsApp        We reported earlier that Mrs Chidiogo Akunyili, the daughter of the late Dora Akunyili, was back in Nigeria to get married to her Canadian husband.       Now the wedding has happened and we have some photos from the event.    It was reported that the wedding ceremony took place today, at the Madona Catholic Church, Agulu, Anambra and was witnessed by family and friends.    Check out some more photos below:             Comments comments      Facebook    Twitter    Google+    Pinterest    WhatsApp        Previous article PHOTOS: Dora Akinyuli’s daughter and Canadian husband arrive Nigeria for wedding       I'm An Era! A Dominican Republic Half Ghanaian International Multiple Award Winning Media Honcho Who is Proud of His Ethnic. I Believe I Can and I Will. I'm Not Measure By My Accent or Color. I am a Decent of the Strong People. I Always Listen to the Songs That Sings in Me and Encourage Me to Dance. I Believe in All the Possibilities I See.
